name: diablo2-protocol
description: diablo 2 packets parsing and serialization, and login sequence implementation to build clients and servers

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run validateProtocols && mocha
scripts.validateProtocols: protodef-validator data/d2gs.json && protodef-validator data/mcp.json && protodef-validator data/sid.json && protodef-validator data/bnftp.json

author: Louis Beaumont
